It's Dasher my Dream

Husky! And It's
FAN FRIDAY!

Are you spring loaded?
Is it Fan Friday?

Is it Fan Friday?
Say It's Fan Friday!

Oh my camera is dirty, I better clean it.
[Dog barking]

You tell em.  It's Fan Friday!
Of course the neighbor decides to cut the grass when we go to do Fan
Friday
Well we are going to do it anyway.  Jesse wants to know, do your dogs get along with cats?
um I don't know if Oakley gets along with cats. I don't know if Memphis gets along with cats, But I know
that Shelby would eat a cat
If given the chance. Where did you go Shelby? There she is!

Nate wants to know, what are your girls going to
be for Halloween and are you going to take them trick or

treating or are you just gonna pass out
candy to the kids

um I don't know what they're gonna be
yet we have to go through our costume bag
and see

if we need to buy some more costumes for
this year. Good Lord!

and as for trick or treating if you guys
don't know we put on a huge Halloween
display at our house ever year.

So we usually just stay here and pass out
candy. And if you wanna see

the display last year we had 85 carved
pumpkins this year adding an animated
pumpkin that's going to go to

lights and music and all that fun stuff.
Be sure the subscriber other channel
which is YouTube.com/WithouttheSnowDogs

because we upload all those videos over
there. And they are worth going to watch.
You can go see last years, and the year befores
Halloween ah . . Halloween display.
Yeah we did 85 carved pumpkins last year.

Donna wants to know, do any of your 
girls know how to open doors or cupboards?

Not yet Memphis has learned if she leans
into the cupboard it bounces and kinda
opens,

but she hasn't fully figured it out yet. Stacy
wants to know what food do you feed your

girls. We just did a video on food
discussion a week or two or
three ago, I don't even know now.
We feed the girls Doctor Tims Kinesis

If you go to our YouTube page and look
at our videos you'll see it. I think it was two or
three weeks ago. We did a

full video on the type of food at all
about if you want to learn more.

Suzanne says when your dogs are outside playing
in the backyard how do you get them come

back inside? Our puppy never wants to
come in and always runs away from us when
we try to get him to come in the house.

This is called recall. Somebody else asked
about this

to, about [what] how do you get your dogs
come when they call. It's called recall. You

need to practice recall. One of the ways to do 
that is you can get a very long training
lead, like a

twenty or thirty foot training lead.
And go out in the yard
attach the lead to the dog like a leash, and then

have a handful of treats or a clicker,
whichever you choose. Call your

dog's name and pull them toward you. And
when they make it all the way toward you
you reward them with a treat.

Um We haven't really practiced that too much
with any of our girls, because

they get treats when they come in the
house after going to the bathroom.

So when we call them when they're out
yard, they pretty much come running to
the door.

So we didn't really, with Shelby, when
she was younger I had used the leash
method for recall. With Memphis I have not worked

with her much on that yet, but it is
something that if you have a husky
recall is definitely something you wanna work on.

Because they are notorious for running
and if they get out

if they have a good recall hopefully
they'll come right back you when you
call their name

in that frantic screaming, oh my gosh my
dog got out. And fortunately
we've never had that happen. Oakley is going to sit there with her back to us
apparently.

Susan wants to know what the girls
registered names are.

Oakley doesn't have a registered name
because we rescued her so we don't even know if she
ever had papers.

Shelby's registered name is Shelby
Mustang. And Memphis is registered name
is Highlanders Memphis Belle.

Shiloh's registered name was Shiloh the
Confederate. She was named after

the battlefield Shiloh Tennessee where I
had ancestors that fought

during the Civil War. So we named her
Shiloh the Confederate. Claire says is

there any way to stop my male husky from
digging up my entire garden?

Yes give them their own area to dig, and area that you will allow
them to dig.

Yes I know I've answered this a lot, but
some you guys are newer in may not have
heard the answer before.

But our girls have a sandbox which is
right there underneath the a-frame.

It is the only place they can dig in the
yard. If they dig anywhere else in the
yard what we do is we take

all their poop and we put it in the hole
they dug. Where we don't want them to dig.

Because normally, a normal dog will not
dig

through their own poop. I know it's gross,
but it works!
And it's a good way to get rid of the poop, if you don't have a place to put it.
And then just give them a sandbox. My girls love their sandbox.

David wants to know if we are still
doing
Pawboxes. We have not been sent a PawBox since

I think it was July. We have been trying
to contact the company

pretty much since then. We finally got an
email back not long ago and it sounds

like their companies going through a lot
of changes, may have been bought.

Sounds like a lotta drama. We're not to 
happy that they've taken so long to

respond to us and it sounds like some of
you have had the same problem.

So I don't think we're gonna be doing
the pawboxes anymore.

I actually think we're looking into doing
a different one.

I am talking with the company right now.
if it all works out it could be

beneficial for us and you because
they're going to be giving us coupon
codes and things like that.
So no probably not doing any more pawboxes, as much as I enjoyed them, but the new
box subscription that we're

hopefully going to be working with is
pretty cool, and I can't wait to tell you guys
more about it.

Jewell says I'm starting a portrait of your
beautiful girls on monday. Would you
like me to share the progress pictures?
If you guys don't know who Jewel Mathieson is, she does

pet portraits by Jewel. If you go to
Facebook and type in pet portrait by
Jewel,

you'll find her Facebook page. She is
doing another book

on Arctic breeds like snow dogs, ah,
Huskies and Malamutes, and Akitas.

All the different northern type breeds, and
she's actually drawing
a photo of two of our girls for the book.

Which we're really super excited about,
and hopefully when the book comes out

will buy a couple copies and be able to give 
away, and you guys can buy some copies
because

I'm not gonna tell you which girls are gonna be in
there. If you guys wanna know you should

go to your Facebook page and make sure
to like the page you can see the updates.

And of course we'll share them on our page too. So,
yes Jewel, we would love for you to share

progress updatesof the drawing. We are
very excited to see them.
We got some Mail! We got some Mail!

What's with the big yawn? What's with the big yawn?
We got a letter and a drawing of Shelby

and Shiloh and Oakley from Evelyn and Evelyn
wants to know which one of the girls
is our favorite!
I don't really have a favorite. We love them all. We love you all.
And we got a letter with a drawing
from 10Huskies on YouTube, her name is Chyanne and Chyanne

wrote me a letter and told me a story,
and I'll kinda shorten story for you
guys.

Um, about how she always wanted a husky.
her and her dad.

Her and her dad always wanted a husky,
and shortly after her dead passed away
she finally found
a husky. Bless you! She finally found

a husky to adopt that was actually born
on the same day that her dad passed away.

She waited 17 years to get the Husky
that she always wanted.

And she basically wanted me to remind
you guys that you know,

never give up. Never give up especially
those of you that say I always wanted a dog.

My mom won't let me get a dog or my 
dad won't let me get a dog. One day,

in the future, you'll be able to get your
dog.

I bet it will happen. Just never stop
dreaming.

And we got a drawing and a little question
from Alexandra.

Alexandra wants to know why don't
you get a male husky?

Cuz it's just turned out that we have
female Huskies. Maybe one day we'll have a boy.

You just never know. But then I can't say my
girls anymore.
And we got another cool drawing

from Selena! We haven't seen your drawings in a couple weeks.
Thanks for sending that! Memphis and Shelby
and Oakley. You girls are wrestling huh. Wrestle Wrestle Wrestle

Oakley is like, I'm not having that!
That's all we have for Fan Friday today you guys. Thanks
for watching, thanks for subscribing!

I think we're going on a color tour this
weekend depending on the weather we may
take the girls with us,

depending on how far we go. Hopefully we
get to take them with us we're hoping to
take the

red Jeep with top down. Some of that video
will be uploaded here if we go and the

rest will be uploaded on our vlog channel.
 So be sure to be subscribed over there
if you're not. I know I keep saying that but you know we have like thirty thousand subscribers

over here, and I think we've only got
like 5500 over there. So some of you guys are
missing out.

Sometimes the dogs are on those videos and
I don't always share those little short
clips over here. So

if you want to see more of the dogs you should be
subscribed over there too.

Anyway thanks for watching you guys.
Stay Positive, dream big and we will see
you

possibly for a snow dog short this
weekend. If not we'll see you on Monday.

Apparently Memphis is trying to get the squirrel.
It's not up there honey.

Thanks for watching you guys. 
See you later!
Bye!
